name: Root Certificate Installed
description: Adversaries may install a root certificate on a compromised system to avoid warnings when connecting to adversary controlled web servers.
false_positives: Help Desk or IT may need to manually add a corporate Root CA on occasion. Need to test if GPO push doesn't trigger FP
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((powershell.file.script_block_text:*Move\-Item* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*Cert\:\\LocalMachine\\Root*) OR (powershell.file.script_block_text:*Import\-Certificate* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*Cert\:\\LocalMachine\\Root*))`
